title: PM designates Ishaq Dar as Deputy PM
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 28 (APP):Prime Minister Muhammad Shehbaz Sharif has designated Minister of Foreign Affairs Ishaq Dar as Deputy Prime Minister.
The Cabinet Division had issued the notification of the appointment.
At present, the foreign minister is accompanying the prime minister on his visit to Saudi Arabia.
